Replace.Text: northern union
northern union
Northern United
Truth is eternal faith

+25% [ICON_Science] technology value, +25% [ICON_Culture] culture value, +25% [ICON_Production] productivity, -75% [ICON_Faith] faith for all friendly cities. Additional territory is gained by building or capturing cities. Tundra provides +1 [ICON_Food] food, tundra hills provide +1 [ICON_Production] production, and snow provides +1 [ICON_Food] food. [NEWLINE] Tundra Hills tiles provide +1 [ICON_Food] food to the city center for every two adjacent snow tiles, and +1 [ICON_Food] food to the city center for each adjacent snow tile. Snowy Hills provide +1 [ICON_Production] production to the city center. [NEWLINE] Farms can be built on frozen soil and snowy terrain. After unlocking "Civil Engineering", farms can be built on frozen soil hills and snowy hills.
Soviet Union
Murmansk
Each political system can obtain an additional wildcard slot, and the loyalty of all one's cities is fixed at 100% (including the cities occupied by one's own).
unbreakable alliance
Soviet Union

The accumulation speed of strategic resources is +100%, and each improved strategic resource will provide bonuses to the current city. All spies can upgrade to agents for free initially, and spies can choose any available upgrade.
Winter's White Cavalry
Chapayev
Soviet Union class battleship
Modern unique naval unit of the Soviet Union, replacing battleships. It has powerful area bombing capabilities and a wider field of view.
Katyusha Garden

Northern United Feature Area, alternative entertainment area. Gain +1 [ICON_Culture] culture bonus from every two adjacent frozen soil and frozen hills tiles, and +1 [ICON_Culture] culture bonus from each adjacent snow and snow hills tile. , each adjacent Wonder gains a +2 [ICON_Culture] culture bonus.

A modern heavy cavalry unit from the Northern Alliance that replaces tanks. More powerful than tanks, cheaper to produce, +5 [ICON_Strength] combat strength when operating in or near the Northern Union Territory. Can move after attacking if there is [ICON_Movement] movement left.

Northern Union characteristic building, replacing the Intelligence Bureau. Spies and espionage capacity +1. The success rate of all espionage operations has been greatly increased. Reward 1 [Icon_Governor] governor title.
Northern Joint Security Service

Northern Union's characteristic building replaces the nuclear power plant. Has higher [ICON_Production] productivity and [ICON_Science] science bonuses. Automatically convert any amount of uranium into [ICON_Power] electricity, providing cities within 9 tiles with the [ICON_Power] power they need each turn. [NEWLINE]The probability of a nuclear accident after completion increases as the plant ages. Its [ICON_Production] productivity and [ICON_Science] technology bonuses extend to all city centers within 9 tiles (provided it does not already receive bonuses from other "power plant" buildings).
alliance core hub

Fearless Soviet Union, you are the supreme leader of the Northern Alliance, which gathers under your banner to become the great alliance that shines in the polar regions. You have great charisma and political iron fist - these qualities make your country's people popular, and the people who are always loyal to you will write a glorious chapter of dancing with the extremely cold climate under your leadership. Celebrate, the Most Benevolent, Most High, Most Powerful, Most Good Alliance, the Great Northern Union!

The white cavalry of winter, Chapayev, the leader of the Northern Alliance! You lead the Northern Alliance to expand their territories. The vast territory and rich products of the motherland will also give you huge wealth! With your extremely shrewd resource management and dark side diplomacy, the Northern Alliance will prosper and become stronger! Celebrate, the Most Benevolent, Most High, Most Powerful, Most Good Alliance, the Great Northern Union!
leningrad
Stalingrad
Kyiv
minsk
Kirov
Frunze
Tbilisi
smolensk
Tula
Klin
Crimea
Kharkiv
Kalinin
Murmansk
sevastopol
Zhukov
Chuikov
Katyusha
great patriotic war
+5 [ICON_Strength] combat strength in or near Northern Confederation Territory.
Will you sign a friendly covenant with me?
Let’s end this dispute first, and may the truth last forever!
There is no peace between us! Truth will come down with the hammer!
Let the war end. Continuing the fight will damage the alliance!
We temporarily allow your troops to pass through our great country.
Despicable capitalist slaves also want to set foot on our great territory? Never allow it!
Our torrent of steel will travel to distant lands, please allow us to pass through your territory.
Your army is near the border. Withdraw your troops immediately or we will strike first!
I am the Supreme Leader of the Northern Alliance, the Soviet Union. Look at our great motherland and witness the truth! Let me remind you first, don't block my way!
Nice to meet you. I invite you to come to our nearby city and see our great motherland!
How about exchanging capital information? This will help the Northern Union trade with you.
Is there anything to trade?
Northern United recognizes your will! May the truth be with you!
The truth has been revealed, but you are still worshiping that illusory thing? Extremely stupid!
(You are recognized by the truth)
(You are violating the truth of Northern Union)
My mood becomes better because of your proposal. Let us witness the truth together!
Northern United never declares friendship with others easily, and the truth does not recognize your will!
Let us declare friendship and witness the truth shining on the whole world!
Thanks.
You are testing my patience...
bring it on! The Union of the North has defeated its greatest foes, and you are not even close!
The truth will strike hard at the evil ones!
Is that the end? Is the alliance falling apart? The truth is leaving me.
Northern United has agreed to host your delegation and we appreciate your gift.
Northern United doesn't need your stuff.
I'm sending a delegation to bring you some gifts. Would you like some vodka?
Will our truth care about the gossip of evil people? But there will be a price to pay for saying the wrong thing!
You are the sin of the world, from head to toe, dripping with blood and filth from every pore! (condemn you)
truth
I like countries that develop culture and hate countries with high faith values.
Will you sign a friendly covenant with me?
Haha, let’s do this for now~
There is no peace between us! Destroy everything!
Let's put down our weapons and have a talk, shall we?
We temporarily allow your troops to pass through our great country.
Despicable capitalist slaves also want to set foot on our great territory? Never allowed!
Our torrent of steel will travel to distant lands, please allow us to pass through your territory.
Your army is near the border. Withdraw your troops immediately or we will strike first!
Look who this is? Huhu. It's really good...ah, I'm sorry. I am the Supreme Leader of the Northern Alliance, Chapayev. Do you have any high-quality resources there? Hehehe...
Nice to meet you. I invite you to come to our nearby city and see our great motherland!
How about exchanging capital information? This will help the Northern Union trade with you.
Is there anything to trade?
Oh my, you really like me, it's great. Haha, what kind of compliment do you want me to give you?
I think it would be better to give you some more severe "education"... Hmm... It's really difficult...
(You have Chapayev’s approval)
(You are going against Chapayev's agenda)
You have to pay careful attention to the person you entrust your life to. Don't worry, I will always hold on to the reins tightly~
What do you want to tell me? I don’t think you’re good enough for me yet~ It seems you still want to work harder!
Are you willing to be my friend who trusts each other with your life?
Thanks.
It looks like you are quite ill.
Want to touch it? Oops, you are talking about this cannon and not me, hehehe~ I will fight seriously!
Disobedient children need to be "punished"! Destroy everything!
Wow... I'm a bit careless... I have to work harder in the future...
I agree to receive your delegation and I appreciate your gift.
Northern United doesn't need your stuff.
I'm sending a delegation to bring you some gifts. Would you like some vodka?
Do you want to give you a small prop to plug your mouth? Hahaha... don't regret what you said!
You seem to be sick? It seems that I have to take good care of you personally! (condemn you)
Winter Knight
It likes nuclear weapons and dislikes civilizations that launch surprise wars.

A modern heavy cavalry unit from the Northern Alliance that replaces tanks. More powerful than tanks, cheaper to produce, +5 [ICON_Strength] combat strength when operating in or near the Northern Union Territory. Can move after attacking if there is [ICON_Movement] movement left.
Northern Union characteristic building, replacing the Intelligence Bureau. Spies and espionage capacity +1. The success rate of all espionage operations has been greatly increased.

Northern Union's characteristic building replaces the nuclear power plant. Has higher [ICON_Production] productivity and [ICON_Science] science bonuses. Its [ICON_Production] productivity and [ICON_Science] technology bonuses extend to all city centers within 9 tiles (provided it does not already receive bonuses from other "power plant" buildings).
